title: How much will not knowing how to stutter step affect me?
body:
So my current preferences for lanes and roles go something like Mid(Highly) - Top - Support - Jungle -ADC(I avoid it at all costs)

Now, I CAN stutter step when I'm playing low as fuck AS champs. Like, I can cancel my auto animations on Ahri no worries, not that it makes a huge difference on her anyway, but I only do that through right clicking on the champion and then right clicking on the ground as soon as the projectile is fired off. I DON'T know how to Attack Move or any fancy stuff like that.

I'm currently in Silver 4, and climbing, slowly, but climbing, and I feel like I can maybe get to gold by the end of this season, MAYBE. (Hope that doesn't sound too arrogant). My question is, always trying to avoid ADC as MUCH as I can, never playing it, or champions that rely on it for that matter, how much is  not knowing how to effectively and properly kite/stutter step gonna affect me moving forward?

replies.body:
- Self plug - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/tTVITxxq-a-newbie-and-general-mechanical-guide-to-league?comment=0000
(That's my guide on general mechanic's)

Besides that, it wont affect you unless you really wanna get a higher rank. It'll slow it down fo' sure though.

It'd only be an issue if you were actually playing ADC alot. You can easily get away with having one or two roles you suck at as long as you can play a few different ones. Decision making and map awareness are much more important than mechanics in silver anyway, I doubt it would be an issue til like diamond or master as long as you're playing champions that aren't really affected by it (I'm plat and my mechanics are horrible, especially with ADCs).

Maybe try a more caster type ADC like ezreal or graves in case you have to play it, but I wouldn't worry about it too much. Good luck getting to gold!
Thanks man! Hope I can make good on it!

If you avoid ADC role then stutter stepping probably won't affect you much at all.
It's crucial for position on ADCs, more specifically on kiting.
Play champs with autoattack resets like Vayne and Wukong and you're all gucci.

It's gonna affect you about as much as it effects any of your mid laners hoenstly.

With the resergence of the tank meta i've been seeing a lot less people calling mid lane (because it's less of a lane to carry all) and actual diversity in calling happening, due to this, your more likely to get the lane you want, if you can support generally you can avoid being ADC and if worst comes to worst and your last pick, just call "anything but ADC" (before i learned jungle this season i spent ages calling "anything but jungle")

Everyone has a main lane etc and sure some games they have to take what they are given, but those are few and far between.

It's too hard to say considering the game is made of many factors. My mechanics are wood 7, but I have decent awareness and decision-making is decent and I'm currently in gold. You could prolly get plat if the rest of your game is good.
